title: Best Service - Altus [KONTAKT]
description:

Altus is a unique solo vocal library featuring JosÃƒÂ© HernÃƒÂ¡ndez Pastor, a countertenor with a magnificent expression and a truly beautiful and unique voice.
Altus is aimed at easily creating your own ultra-realistic melodies, without using any phrases. Altus offers a powerful and innovative word builder which combines 26 words (136 elements including words and their syllables) with 5 true legato and portamento vowels (a, e, i, o, u), all at your fingertips in one patch.

=======[ Instruction ]===============================================================

For Kontakt 5.3 (and above)

--- [ METHOD I ] ---

- Open Kontakt 5.3 (and above)
- Go to File tab
- Browse for the torrent folder
- Drag n Drop the NKI files into the Right Panel to use.

--- [ METHOD II ] ---

- Go to Library tab
- Click Add Library
- Browse for the library folder's location
- Click Ok/Yes
- Accept or Yes when asked
